products.title: Bosworth Seville Roman Blind
products.description: Bosworth is a patterned fabric which comes in 4 very beautiful soft colours. This geometric patterned roman blind will fit in perfectly with warm colour schemes and will add a stylish touch to any room in your home. Product id: db-rom0615 fabric colour: seville material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes bosworth seville roman blind in grey/yellow/multicoloured.

products.title: Meadow Flower Asc Spring Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their meadow flower range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Hive Plain Barley Perfect Fit
products.description: Hiveplainbarleyperfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveplain" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive plain barley perfect fit pleated blind px71003.

products.title: Sakura Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of oursakura patterned range, with a simple floral design which will bring warmth to any room. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through.

products.title: Gloss Taped Cream Real Wood
products.description: The gloss range is the ultimate in sophistication; we have taken the timeless appearance of the wooden blind and given it a modern funky twist. This cream gloss taped blind combines a classic neutral colour with a stylish gloss finish to create a stunning blind that will look great in any room in your home. The matching tapes add an extra feel of luxury. Product id: sdb-wsb0171 fabric colour: creme material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 50mm slat material: painted finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention tape colour: vanilla light filtering: yes gloss taped cream real wood in cream.

products.title: Capella, Carbon Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The wonderful thing about carbon silver is that it manages to combine the charm and sophistication of two metallic finishes in perfect harmony. The silver shines under the light, and the carbon provides balance and stability that allows you to transition between more luxurious pieces as you move around the room. Use carbon silver in the dining room where it can partner your new glass dining table with chrome frame.

products.title: Words, Spring - Roller Blind
products.description: The words spring is a white blind with grey and soft purple letters sprinkled over the top. A lightweight and high quality fabric allows the light to filter through, creating a sunny, cheery vibe in any room. Use the spring in the home office to reflect a business mind, and accentuate with dove grey walls, white furniture, and lilac stationery, which will lead to a cool, contemporary look that doesn't take itself too seriously.

products.title: Words, Summer - Roller Blind
products.description: The fun, alphabet sprinkled words summer is a bold, funky choice for your home, and you'll find yourself absentmindedly creating words from nowhere. The bright lime and vivid yellow are tempered by the subtle dove grey, and placed on an off-white background fabric that allows light to filter through at will. Use the summer in a family dining room to add fun and games to dinnertime, or hang in a child's bedroom to get them learning the alphabet without even thinking about it.

products.title: Words, Autumn - Roller Blind
products.description: Words in autumn is all about fun and games, with its scattered alphabet and bright, fruity orange tones. This light-filtering blind is made from quality, lightweight white fabric, and controlled by an easy-to-use roller mechanism. Add a vivid splash of colour to the kitchen, and accent it with oranges and greys all around. Or instead, settle amongst plain wallpaper in the kids' bedroom and match with funky colours to create a bold, fun look that will have them sure to go up to bed on time.

products.title: Anthology, Fire Brick - Roller Blind
products.description: Fire brick is the latest addition to their new anthology collection, and it's a design that is sure to live long in the memory. This isn't a fabric that glistens and sparkles, and yet it still manages to catch your eye from a variety of different angles. It's the subtle way in which the flecks of white break up the surface that do it. If you want to create a modern look that will stand the test of time, what better place for fire brick than the kitchen? You can match your tiles and flooring to the red brick shade which then leaves you with plenty of space for a secondary colour on your units and worktops.

products.title: Anthology, Fired Earth - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology fired earth is a rich symphony of terracotta reds and calming whites that catches your eye the moment you walk in the room. The intricacy is what brings the fabric to life, and it's what will enable you to weave in half a dozen matching textures without crowding your space. We love the idea of using fired earth in the kitchen alongside some matching tiling and worktops. You could then paint the units a light graphite grey for a natural colour match you won't see anywhere else.

products.title: Anthology, Snowy Mountain - Roller Blind
products.description: Snow mountain provides a crisp white with a subtle hint of blue -perfect for injecting something a little unexpected into the mix. As you look closer you come to see that it's the quality of the weave that defines the fabric, and that it's just the level of detail you need to provide your interiors with new depth and clarity. Combine the blue undertone of snow mountain with a crisp apple green to create a light and vibrant space that doesn't overwhelm the senses.
